FILE: cm541572v11.0.txt
DYAD: MOZAMBIQUE - SWAZILAND
RIVALRY: RIV1156
DISPUTE(S): MID4169 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180731
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20181005

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4169

TERRMID: MID4169 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4169 from Gibler 2018, in 1994 Swazi troops crossed the border into Mozambique, drawing protest from Mozambique. The incident appears to be accidental and did not escalate. Coded not territory because the countries were not disputing a boundary. 

TERRLINK: MID4169 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4169 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4169 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4169 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4169 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4169 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4169 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4169 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4169
rivalry=541572 nationa=SWAZILAND nationb=MOZAMBIQUE MID4169 19940120-19940120 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE
fatalpb=0 lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Mozambique condemns Swaziland for a border violation. Swaziland pledges to "better relations." No further details available. First and last day of dispute was on 1/20/1994.

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
